name: Juicy Madness
description:
Fight with other fruits and reach the top!

Embrace your opponents one by one with special strategic gameplay equipped with different factors and show off with the special abilities of the characters!

STRATEGIC GAMEPLAY !

Strategy is at the heart of Juicy Madness. Factors such as your character's damage, defense and critical strike probability; Allows you to get maximum enjoy from the game.

SPECIAL POWERS !

Each character has its own special power. These powers serve different purposes. These special powers have some basic features such as Damage, Critical Strike or Defense. Those powers are greatly usefully to help you in your fight against your opponents.

FRUIT MARKET !

When playing Juicy Madness, you are rewarded with Experience Points and Coins every time you win a battle. Use your Coins  to buy other Fruits and Accessories, and double your game pleasure!
